font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 0.3335in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3335in; font-size: 9pt;

note.p: Letter not found; MS is a file copy kept by the Academy. Annotated: 'Expedirt 21/9' [sent 21 September].

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: für Wissenschaft, Künst und höhere Bildung

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: an Herrn Baron Ferd von Mueller

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p: Unter Bescheinigung des Empfanges Ihrer geehrten Sendung vom heutigen Descriptive Notes on Papuan Plants danken wir Ihnen verbindlichst und bitten um Erhaltung Ihres ferneren gütigen Wohlwollens für unsere Stiftung.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
p.seg: d. Z. Vorsitzender des Akademischen Gesammt-Auschusses

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p: for Science, Art and general Culture in

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;

div.p:
Under certification of receipt of your esteemed consignment of today Descriptive Notes on Papuan Plants
B85.06.03. we thank you kindly and request support of your further kindly goodwill for our academy.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p:
Dr V
Dr G. H. Otto Volger.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

cell.p: President at the time of the whole academic committee
